stimulusHtml:
The alternating series test can be used to show convergence of which of the following alternating series?

  1.   4− 1 9 +1− 1 81 + 1 4 − 1 729 + 1 16 −⋅⋅⋅+ a n +⋅⋅⋅,where  a n ={ 8 2 n    if n is odd − 1 3 n   if n is even MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8337@

  2.   1 − 1 2 + 1 3 − 1 4 + 1 5 − 1 6 + 1 7 − 1 8 + ⋯ + a n + ⋯ , w h e r e a n = ( − 1 ) n + 1 n

  3. 2 3 − 3 5 + 4 7 − 5 9 + 6 11 − 7 13 + 8 15 −⋯+ a n +⋯, where  a n = ( −1 ) n+1 n+1 2n+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6B8D@
